Searching.description: Join the Movement @ http://EDM.com **The Extended Mix of 'Run Away' will be available for purchase on 1/28/14** The perfect mix of enchanting vocals, captivating melodies, and strikingly beautiful composition, Fareoh's "Run Away" marks a perfect start to his very own label, Pyramid Scheme. Alluring and emotionally rich, "Run Away" is an immaculately crafted progressive ballad that is sure leave new and old fans alike gasping in wonderâ€¦ you just might want to "Run Away!"
